CustomField.description: Link to the Item Class -- only valid if the Price Rule is not linked to a Item. When linked to a Item Class the Price Rule will automatically be created for all Items created as a child of the Item Class.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Link to the Item Class -- only valid if the Price Rule is not linked to a Item. When linked to a Item Class the Price Rule will automatically be created for all Items created as a child of the Item Class.
CustomField.label: Item Class
